section.title: startRef
section.para: Start code or marker reference - The "id" property id string of the sc element or the sm element a given ec element or em element corresponds.
Value description: NMTOKEN: a string matching the pattern [-._:A-Za-z0-9]+.
section.programlisting:

        <ec startRef="1"/>, italics<ec startRef="2"/></source>
  </segment>
</unit>
